007package renderer.scene.util;
008
009/**
010   An enum to be used by any {@link renderer.scene.Model} that
011   implements the {@link MeshMaker_TP} interface.
012   <p>
013   A {@link renderer.scene.Model} that implements {@link MeshMaker_TP}
014   can build its geometric mesh in any of three structures: using
015   horizontal triangle strips, vertical triangle strips, or individual
016   quads (each made up out of a two triangle strip).
017*/
018public enum MeshType
019{
020   HORIZONTAL,
021   VERTICAL,
022   CHECKER
023   {
024      @Override
025      public MeshType next()
026      {
027         return values()[0]; // rollover to the first value
028      };
029    };
030
031
032   /**
033      Provide a cyclic increment like operation for this enum.
034   <p>
035      https://stackoverflow.com/questions/17664445/is-there-an-increment-operator-for-java-enum
036
037      @return the next {@code MeshType} in the cycle
038   */
039   public MeshType next()
040   {
041      return values()[ordinal() + 1];
042   }
043}
